pengu.messenger

Class APICommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.APICommunicator

  • public class APICommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to make HTTP requests with an API server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  APICommunicator.Request
      A Request object is returned when a request is made to the API server.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequest

        public APICommunicator.Request sendRequest(java.lang.String URL,
                                           java.lang.String[][] parameters)
        Used to send a HTTP request to the Pengu API Server.
        Parameters:
        URL - The complete URL of the API server (The server's: protocol://address/main directory/endpoint).
        parameters - The HTTP POST parameters. A sample input: {{"username","pengu"},{"password","123456"}}.
        Returns:
        Returns a APICommunicator.Request Object
        See Also:
        APICommunicator.Request

      • parseJSON

        public static java.lang.String parseJSON(java.lang.String jsonText,
                                         java.lang.String key)
                                  throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Parses JSON text, allows for value at a specified key to be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        jsonText - String containing JSON text.
        key - The key field that indicates what value needs to be retrieved from the JSON text.
        Returns:
        Returns a String representation containing the value retrieved from the JSON text
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException

      • parseJSONArray

        public static java.lang.String[] parseJSONArray(java.lang.String jsonText)
                                         throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Parses a JSOn array, by converting each item in the array to a String representation.
        Parameters:
        jsonText - String containing JSON text.
        Returns:
        Returns a String array with each item in the JSON array.
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
